messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2778
messages.msgSnippet: Paula, Can you recommend a Homeschool group that is rather informal? I m hoping to find one that emphasizes social time. Thanks much, Suzanne ... From: Paula
messages.messageBody:
Paula,

Can you recommend a Homeschool group that is rather informal? I'm hoping to find one that emphasizes social time.

Thanks much,
Suzanne
----- Original Message -----
From: Paula Sjogerman
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 01, 2003 2:11 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2778


on 1/1/03 6:28 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Hi,
>
> Anyone on the list from the south suburbs of Chicago?
>
> Suzanne

Nope, but I'm from the actual city of Chicago!
Paula
